column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I watched one of those tv shows about food and it was about croissants so the next morning I had a massive craving for one.  I went to Common Bond.  It was OK
column2: nothing to rave about. The ones at Whole Foods were about same if not a little tastier (not that those are gold standard either).  I tried a few other pasties too
column4: certainly not worth waiting 15 mins for a latte for
column5: and I visited on a weekday mid morning
